item.title: I made get commonInitialisms library(Using go/ast)
item.description: Hello. I made get commonInitialisms library for Go. commonInitialism is words that should be written in uppercase on Go. (e.g. ID, JSON, URL, SQL) Why need it commonInitialism is defined "golang.org/x/lint" package. // commonInitialisms is a set of common initialisms. // Only add entries that are highly unlikely to be non-initialisms. // For instance, "ID" is fine (Freudian code is rare), but "AND" is not. var commonInitialisms = map[string]bool{ "ACL": true, "API": true, "ASCII": true, .
